column5: My new house is located at 45 South area where close to Hobby Airport, Beltway 8, 24 hours fitness, AMC Theater, Walmart Supercenter. Pleasant landscaped backyard with patio, quiet neighbors, high speed internet, washer-dryer, it's very convenient for you when you're looking for a place to take a rest while you travel or work in Houston. Welcome to my house !
column8: Master Bedroom in a new single house
